name: Doggo Walko
description:
A browser game about being a heckin' good boi while on a walk! Keep your owner happy by avoiding things that will make him mad and end the walk early. 

Tap WASD or the  arrow keys for movement and jump with the Space Bar. You can also pause the game with the P key.

Built in Unity using Doodle Studio 95 as a personal project to teach myself C#.

Character art provided by the wonderfully talented  @itsraecrawford
